name: places/ChIJObOjlbtYwokRaQ6UVtgsphQ
adrFormatAddress: 1632 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10028-4402, USA

originalText.text: Highly recommend! I accidentally spilled red ink from a pen in my sofa cover and I tried everything to get it out without any luck. They were able to clean this up and left no sign of stain. 5 stars!

text.text: Highly recommend! I accidentally spilled red ink from a pen in my sofa cover and I tried everything to get it out without any luck. They were able to clean this up and left no sign of stain. 5 stars!

originalText.text: This place really gives 5-star service in all regards. I get my laundry done there at least once a week (usually more often because let's be honest, it's NYC) and the service is always truly great. They pick up my laundry, handle it with care, and deliver it promptly. I trust this place with my clothes. Any time there has been a slight issue (which happens in all businesses), they are VERY quick to rectify it. This is high quality service. I also use them for dry cleaning and alterations and have been more than satisfied with all of these services. I would highly recommend this place to anyone in the Yorkville or UES area.

originalText.text: I was in town for a short while and been their customer during my trip and I can say that they are the best laundry service I experienced. All stains were removed and they did an exquisite job on my 2 pants that I had them altered even though I needed it rushed. All in all, everything is superb and will definitely recommend their service to friends in town.

originalText.text: I transferred here from my previous dry cleaners since pandemic.  Ivory Cleaners really did a great job with my clothes that has stains and dog hairs that my past dry cleaners can't get off. Vincent was really kind to accommodate me and picked up my laundry even on short notice.

text.text: I transferred here from my previous dry cleaners since pandemic.  Ivory Cleaners really did a great job with my clothes that has stains and dog hairs that my past dry cleaners can't get off. Vincent was really kind to accommodate me and picked up my laundry even on short notice.

originalText.text: I have been a customer for the last few months and couldn’t be happier. It is clear that Vincent has a lot of pride in his business. Always a great job. He has been able to get out every stain, and every stubborn  dog hair. Cleaning is done quickly and efficiently and can be picked up and delivered as well. They also offer quality alterations which I have been happy too. Definitely an asset to the neighborhood.
